name: icescrum-build-notify
description: Notify iceScrum of build status. This let iceScrum display build status and which user stories are available in this build. The product owner will be able to retrieve the last successful build for a given user story.
author: Kagilum

inputs.name: projecturl
inputs.label: Project URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: This is your iceScrum project URL

inputs.name: accesstoken
inputs.label: Access token
inputs.helpMarkDown: Learn how to generate an iceScrum access token: https://www.icescrum.com/documentation/rest-api/#authentication

inputs.name: samplebool
inputs.label: Sample Boolean
inputs.helpMarkDown: If this is true, this task will fail if any errors are written to the StandardError stream.
